replies.body:

Thought this was serious because when I tab then get the win/lose button my game crashes :P
Yea if you spam tab while the nexus explodes the game crashes or something like that
i found a bug {{champion:121}}
{{champion:72}}
{{champion:96}}
Standard score for supports. :P
Report Thresh for feeding and stealing CS.
Known issue
see thresh stats......
OMG that Thresh score! What happened? Was the game really like?

Not at all, me and my friend lost bot lane hard while our other friends did fine :p Although at one point the enemy team started doing baron and I said to my friends over skype "I'm gonna steal baron with a hook" and then I stole it (294 damage hook before resistances!)

But the minions.... How'd you get the number that high? Lol

Imma laugh if this is photoshopped because that didn't even hit me until now :P
Not photoshopped, just glitched at the end (post-game lobby was fine)
O, the powers of Photoshop.
Nah bro, it's not fake and I don't even know how to photoshop :[
LOL!
ZZ ROT PORTALS{{item:3512}}
LOL{{champion:412}}  OP
im surprised he could afford any items on that support salary
Did you not see his creep kills? He musta had bank!
The creep score is what I don't understand...
ya hes op
